name: ableton-midi-sculptor
description: The **Ableton MIDI Clip Variator** is a [Max for Live device](http://ableton.com/maxforlive) for [Ableton Live](http://ableton.com/live/) that makes it easy to create variations of MIDI clips with tools to modify velocity and timing.

scripts.compile: tsc && cp src/main.js build/main.js && cp -r src/test/. build/test
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle
